title: Manga Sentiment Analysis
text:

Tools: Python (Selenium, TextBlob, NLTK)
Visualized sentiment trends in Power BI and Tableau
Links: GitHub

title: Hi, I’m Hien (Emi) Bui
text:
I’m a Data Science master’s student (Drew University, expected 2026) with a background in Economics (B.A.) and minors in Mathematics & Asian Studies.
Before transitioning into data, I spent 6+ years managing projects in VFX/animation and client services—leading cross-functional teams, delivering for global clients, and honing communication and leadership skills.
Today, I combine that creative and organizational background with data science, machine learning, and analytics to solve real-world problems. My work spans ML model development, coding experiments, and interactive dashboards.




Programming & Tools: Python · R · SQL · Jupyter Notebook · VSCode

Visualization & BI: Tableau · Power BI · Plotly · Data Wrangling

3D & Creative: Maya · Blender · Substance Painter

Other: Google Suite · Microsoft Office




Project Management · Data Analysis · Data Visualization · Communication
Problem Solving · Teamwork · Critical Thinking · Research

👉 Check out my Projects, view my Resume, or connect via LinkedIn / GitHub.

title: Tesla EV Adoption
text:
Analyzed 235k+ EV records with Python (Polars, Plotly) to compare adoption trends across brands.

Built dashboards to explore adoption by city/brand
Published interactive insights in a Medium article
Skills: Python, Polars, Plotly, Data Wrangling, Visualization
Links: GitHub, Medium Article

title: Luxury Car Price Prediction
text:
Built a predictive model for car prices.

Explored luxury car dataset
Applied regression models to predict price ranges
Skills: Python, Regression, EDA
Links: GitHub

title: Movie Recommender System
text:
Created a recommender using multiple ML models.

Implemented KNN, Decision Tree, Logistic Regression in Python/R
Achieved ~80% accuracy in predicting highly rated movies
Skills: ML Algorithms, Scikit-learn, R
Links: GitHub
